name: SystolicBloodPressureGreaterThanEqualTo140
title: Systolic Blood Pressure Greater Than Equal To 140
description: Representative systolic blood pressure greater than or equal to 140.  Including inactive codes to account for historical data.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Most recent systolic blood pressure >= 140),(Data Element Scope: Representative systolic blood pressure >= 140.  Likely Procedure or Observation.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT Level II codes that represent only a systolic blood pressure >= 140),(Exclusion Criteria: Diastolic blood pressure codes, codes that represent both a systolic and diastolic reading)

concept.display: Most recent systolic blood pressure greater than or equal to 140 mm Hg (HTN, CKD, CAD) (DM)

contains.display: Most recent systolic blood pressure greater than or equal to 140 mm Hg (HTN, CKD, CAD) (DM)
